5419.quoteText: We may use cookies, log files, web beacons, JavaScript, and other similar technology (“Cookies and Similar Technology”) to collect and store the information we collect
5419.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
